amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for Environmental Programs by $5 million and to reduce the funding for the Office of the Secretary by $5.5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase FS state and private forestry by $4 million, offset by the Office of the Secretary.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A023) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A023) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
